/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.name: Unnecessary use of `cat` process
/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.description: Using the `cat` process to read a file is unnecessarily complex, inefficient, unportable, and can lead to subtle bugs, or even security vulnerabilities.
/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.message: Unnecessary use of `cat` process. Can be replaced with: fs.readFileSync(name)
